wikipedia_page.main: Gurbinder Singh Cheema (born (1978-11-14)14 November 1978) is a British male weightlifter, competing in the 105 kg category and representing Great Britain and England at international competitions. He competed at world championships, most recently at the 2001 World Weightlifting Championships. He represented England at the 2002, 2006 and 2010 Commonwealth Games.
